meanings.definition: To remove dead skin cells from the surface of the skin.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys exfoliating her skin to make it smoother.
meanings.sent2: I exfoliate my face twice a week to keep it healthy.
meanings.sent3: After exfoliating, her skin felt like a fresh canvas ready for makeup.
meanings.sent4: Exfoliating is like peeling away the old to reveal the new underneath.
meanings.sent5: The process of exfoliating can reveal a radiant complexion.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to exfoliate the skin.
meanings.sent1: She bought a new exfoliating scrub for her skincare routine.
meanings.sent2: The exfoliating cream had tiny beads to gently cleanse the skin.
meanings.sent3: The spa offered an exfoliating treatment that left her skin glowing.
meanings.sent4: The exfoliating mask worked wonders in removing impurities.
meanings.sent5: Using an exfoliating product can improve skin texture.
